reviews.review: The game itself sucks ass, but it's good to have as expansion for Garry's Mod, which is based on this game and some other CS games. Very handy but not fun to play, I would recommend this for usage as Expension ( or DLC ) for Garry's Mod.

Poco puede decirse de este maravilloso juego. Pueden pasar todos los a√±os que quieran, pero nunca caera en el olvido y nunca importar√° cual desfasados esten sus gr√°ficos. Una formula sencilla pero efectiva que te har√° pasar horas y horas de entretenimiento con tus amigos. Un MUST para cualquier gamer que se precie.

A franquia Counter Strike sempre foi um cl√°ssico, este n√£o √© diferente. Cs: source j√° cativou milhares de jogadores pelo mundo, e foi um grande sucesso da franquia. Mesmo com o novo Cs:GO, muitos ainda preferem jogar o source por ser um jogo mais "direto" por assim dizer. O Source √© um belo aprimoramento do Cs 1.6 Cl√°ssico.

Nota Final: Horas Jogadas/10
En mi opini√≥n, la mejor versi√≥n de Counter Strike que han sacado. La fluidez de los gr√°ficos y la forma de disparar es incomparable!

10/10

I probably wouldn't play CS:S as much anymore if it weren't for the unfortunate fact that it's one of the only still-played multiplayer shooters that my boyfriend's shitty laptop can run (because he's still a filthy console peasant). It seems like the only servers that contain players are single-map ones. That said, it's still entertaining in the wee hours when people are just shit-talking each other and having fun. However, if you have a better PC then there are better games out there. Hell, at least there are rotating map servers in Global Offensive.
